name: Sanic DEMO
description:
[Pause the game pressing 'P' to check the character's move list]

Sanic The Hedgehog evolved since the DEMO 1.1.0! Now he can use skills to pass the levels, all without losing his original gameplay style!
Fight against Aggman in the original-textured levels, find easter eggs and enjoy all modes of gameplay! (But be warned: MLG Hardcore mode is for TRUE MLG PLAYERS! Learn to use Sanic's shield for you advantage)
The game features a VS mode, so you can play against Computer controled characters, and also has a multiplayer! (multiplayer disabled due to instability, but you can still download the older version 1.2.3 to play the last playable multiplayer version)
You can find more players to play in MSK Games G+ Community or Discord server.

Additional info of how to play the game and credit of some images in the Read me file (READ THE READ ME FILE).

Credit of musics in the sound test.

And remember: it's still a demo. Give me feedback if you find any kind of glitches or if you think I can improve something in the game.

If you are a youtuber and did a video about my game, plz let me know!
